PropertyList.title: Bell-412 Aircraft Help
PropertyList.line: * Starting:
Doors closed
Rotor brake Off (0%)
Collectiv: down
OH Panel: BUS1, BUS2, INV1, INV2, Beacon : ON
Console: Bat1 (below Airspeed instrument):
Pedestal: Fuel XFeed, Intcon: ON
For each engine (one after the other):
Pedestal: FUEL TRANS: ON, BOOST PUMP: ON, FUEL Valve: ON
Pedestal: GOVernor:AUTO, PART SEP: NORM, HYDR-SYS: ON
Collectiv: Engine throttle at 15% (use mouse wheel)
According to the ext. air temperature, wait until OIL temp indicates 30C deg.
Collectiv: click on the Starter switch (mouse-left: Engine1, mouse-middle: Engine 2
==> wait until N1/N2 indicate 100% ( 90 seconds for 1st engine, 40s for scd. engine)
ATTN: during start, engine throttle move automagically, don't change it
* Takeoff:
Wait to NR Nominal (minimum at 95%)
Pull cyclic a little bit near you (chopper nose up)
Gently increase the collectiv (PgDown key)
More information on the README file
* Options (Bell-412 menu)
- "Shake Me Honey": rotor vibration effect when landed.
* Alarms reset
- general: cautions panel, click on the reset button (top/center)
- radioalt: left click on the DH knob (it will reset the DH alt too)
Check for the last version at: https://sourceforge.net/projects/bell-412
